posts.post_content:
I have the following PSA graded T206s for sale:

Germany Schaefer, PSA 4(MK), Sovereign 150, pencil writing on back - $37 SOLD
Harry Pattee, PSA 4, Sweet Caporal 150/25, no creases - $85  SOLD
 Terry Turner, PSA 3.5, Sweet Caporal 350/25, no creases - $37 SOLD
J.J. Clarke (Cleveland), PSA 4, Sweet Caporal 150/25, no creases - $45  SOLD
 Charlie Carr, PSA 3, Sweet Caporal 350/25, no creases, mild staining - $37
Jake Stahl (Glove Shows), PSA 3, Polar Bear, tobacco stains - $40 SOLD
Rube Waddell (Portrait), PSA 3, Sweet Caporal 150/30, light crease across chest - $110 SOLD
Rube Manning (Pitching), PSA 3, Sweet Caporal 350/30 - $37 SOLD

Backs scans provided upon request.  Just having trouble posting scans.

Prices include shipping.  Add $2.00 for insurance (at buyer’s option).

E-mails committing to purchase take priority over posts.  Please e-mail at [URL="sschris@att.net"]sschris@att.net[/URL] if interested.  

Paypal is my preferred method of payment, but other arrangements can be made.

PLEASE BE PATIENT WITH E-MAIL RESPONSES/CORRESPONDENCE.  I HAVE LIMITED ACCESS TO MY E-MAIL DURING THE DAYTIME.  I WILL REPLY TO ALL E-MAILS - USUALLY LATE IN THE EVENING.  THANKS.

Steve

Steve,

Thanks for the quick delivery...awesome!!!
